title: Late Night Workout
description: When a new trainer starts working at the gym where Allie and a friend work out, they find themselves playfully flirting for his attention. It becomes obvious to them both that he is interested in Allie and when she is there on her own late one evening he offers to give her a training session. She gets excited when he canâ€™t keep his hands off her as he takes her around the equipment and when he offers her a massage it is too good an opportunity to miss. The sensual touch of his hands on her naked skin turns her on and it leads to more than just a massage.
author: Allie Wilder
